product_name: ERGObaby Organic Collection Baby Carrier - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made from 100% certified organic cotton, the Ergobaby Organic Collection Baby Carrier blends eco-consciousness with ergonomic comfort for both you and baby on your daily adventures. Award-winning design for comfortable carrying. 100% Oeko-Tex certified oganic cotton (even the cotton sateen lining). Baby is cradled in a natural sitting position and can be carried on the adult's front, back or hip. Padded waist belt ensures baby's weight is evenly distributed between your hips and shoulders. Adjustable, cushy padded shoulder straps. Large zippered storage pocket for supplies. Hood is rated UPF 50+ and has its own storage pocket. Designed for babies weighing 7 lbs. - 45 lbs. (newborns require the Infant Insert, not included). Reinforced stitching for extra durability. Shoulder-strap length range: 24 in. - 44 in. Waistbelt circumference range: 26 in. - 55 in. Ergobaby Organic Collection Baby Carrier is machine washable and designed in the USA. Closeout.
short_description: Made from 100% certified organic cotton, the Ergobaby Organic Collection Baby Carrier blends eco-consciousness with ergonomic comfort for both you and baby on your daily adventures.
